amendment.description: To make a technical amendment to ensure that assistance is provided for tree replacement for losses due to citrus canker.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2107 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 2107 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Graham FL. (consideration: CR S14009; text: CR S14009) To make a technical amendment to ensure that assistance is provided for tree replacement for losses due to citrus canker.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2107 proposed by Senator Bennett for Senator Graham FL.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2107 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
